headline: 2 Nuclear Energy Stocks for Explosive Growth
summary: In this piece, we’ll check in on a few nuclear energy names that might be worth a second look now that the AI-driven hype has cooled off a bit. Undoubtedly, even a steep correction (think 40-50%) might not be enough of a discount should an AI bubble finally end up popping, dragging down many of ... 2 Nuclear Energy Stocks for Explosive Growth

headline: TD Cowen Bullish on Constellation Energy (CEG) After Calpine Acquisition
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) ranks among the most promising QQQ stocks according to hedge funds. On January 9, TD Cowen began coverage of Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) with a Buy rating and a $440 price target, citing the scale benefits of the Calpine Corporation acquisition, and the potential of continuous power contraction over forward market […]
